        <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {


	var endPoint =current.source.endpoint_url.toString();
	var gr = new GlideRecord(current.getTableName());
	gr.addQuery("source", current.source);
	gr.query();
	var newEndPoint=endPoint;
	while (gr.next()) {
		if (gr.getValue("sys_id") != current.sys_id.toString()) {
			newEndPoint = endPoint.replace(gr.getValue("version"),current.version.toString());
			if (gr.active) {
				gr.setValue("active", false);
				gr.update();
				gs.addInfoMessage(gs.getMessage("Version {0} was set inactive", gr.getValue("version")));
				gs.info("Version "+ gr.getValue("version") + " is made Inactive ");
			}
		}
	}

	if(endPoint != newEndPoint){
		var source =new GlideRecord("sn_hr_integrations_source");
		source.get(current.source);
		source.setValue("endpoint_url", newEndPoint);
		source.update();
	}

})(current, previous);]]></script>
